header.title: Serena AI
header.subtitle: An empathic conversation experience with Artificial Intelligence.

home.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout from Serena AI?

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Serena AI is a virtual assistant for informational and empathetic listening purposes. It does not replace professional care from psychologists, therapists, or psychiatrists. If you are going through a difficult time, please seek specialized medical help.

chat.warning: Serena AI may make mistakes. Please verify information and consult a specialist when needed.

sidebar.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.passwordUpper: Password must contain an uppercase letter.
validation.passwordLower: Password must contain a lowercase letter.
validation.passwordSymbol: Password must contain a special character.

plansPage.title: Choose your plan
plansPage.subtitle: Enjoy the best of Serena AI

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Serena AI. By using our services, you agree to the following terms of use. Please read carefully before proceeding.
terms.noMedical: Serena AI is a virtual assistant focused on emotional support and guided reflections. We do not provide medical diagnoses or replace mental health professionals.
terms.privacy: All interactions may be recorded for continuous improvement purposes, respecting your privacy according to our Privacy Policy.
terms.agreement: Using the service implies full acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use Serena AI.
terms.changes: We reserve the right to update the terms at any time. Check this page periodically to stay informed about changes.

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Ideal for those who want to try with limited features.

pro.title: Pro Plan
pro.description: Full access, faster responses, and priority support.

plans.thanks-for-the-suport: Thank you for supporting the project!

about.title: About the Creator
about.description: Hi! My name is Rhaniery Mueller, founder of Mueller Solutions. With years of experience as a fullstack developer, I created Serena AI to bring technology and mental well-being closer together. I believe in the power of digital empathy and the potential of voice assistants to make emotional care more accessible to everyone.
